column1: We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them
Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow
Stay away from those people who try to disparage your ambitions
When you give joy to other people, you get more joy in return
When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world
It is only when we take chances, when our lives improve
The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same
Success usually comes to those who are too busy looking for it
Nothing in the world can take the place of Persistence
Lift your head up King, you dropped your crown
Words don't matter in showing how much you love a person, Mr.Bean never spoke a word but he never left Teddy behind
Fear has killed more dreams than failure ever has
Never switch up on the minis just because you got a big pot, remember who got you to 50 shield
How do you expect to get high ground, if you don't expect to build
